samples.question: At the moment I am working?
samples.transcript: I am having my own business. Ok. Some questions will be based on children.
samples.transcript_original: I am having my own business. Ok. Some questions will be based on children.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I am having my own business. Ok. Some questions will be based on children.

samples.question: Do you enjoy spending time with children?
samples.transcript: Yes of course I enjoy being around children because childhood is a period full of curiosity, creativity and energy and it makes me feel more happy whenever I see children think how they think and how they ask different questions to people it always reminds me that life is very happy good and we must be careful.

samples.question: What were you like as a child?
samples.transcript: Well as a child I was very talkative and a cheerful child. I used to ask so many questions to my parents and teachers. I used to read many story books and pretend to be a teacher which I am actually right now and at that time I was quite happy. The life was very very simple yet beautiful.

samples.question: What do you remember most about your childhood?
samples.transcript: Well I remember spending time outdoors with my cousins especially during the summer vacations we used to play some traditional games like kho kho, hide and seek and some other games as well so those moments were very beautiful some questions will be based on colours what is your favourite colour and why well honestly speaking my favourite colour is a soft blue it is very calming colour and always makes me remind about the sea and the ocean. And whenever I wear this color, I see somewhere as this color, I always feel peaceful.

samples.question: Have your color preferences changed since childhood?
samples.transcript: Yes a lot. When I was a kid then I used to love bright colours such as red and some other dark colours but with the passage of time my preference has been changed a lot. Now I am more inclined to soft shades like base, olive, sea green and some other light colours. Because I find them quite refreshing. And I think with the passage of time my taste has become more subtle and mature. Some questions will be based on cars.

samples.question: Do you enjoy driving and travelling by car?
samples.transcript: Well, honestly, I love travelling by car, especially the long drives with good music. And I find this is a sense of it gives me a sense of freedom as well. I do not drive myself but I enjoy sitting in the car and watching the view pass by. I feel so happy and excited.

samples.question: What Kind of Car Would You Like to Have in the Future?
samples.transcript: To be honest, I would like to own an electronic SUV some day. OK.
